casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Craig WALKER. No. 203P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. J. Aldean Webster, III, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Anthony Craig Walker, for Walker, Anthony Craig. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of June 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
